text: Paul M. Cook (April 25, 1924 â€“ December 14, 2020) was an American businessman. He was the founder and CEO of Raychem. In 1988, he was awarded the National Medal of Technology by President Ronald Reagan. Cook was born in Ridgewood, New Jersey. Cook died on December 14, 2020 at the age of 96.Paul Cook, former SRI board member and founder of SRI spin-out Raychem, Passes at 96 ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Businesspeople from New Jersey
title: Paul M. Cook
